title: Menagerie of Adventures #3
description:
Welcome to Menagerie of Adventures #3, a collection of five 1st- to 9th-level 5E adventures. 
These adventures include The God Wheel, where the party discovers a legendary stone wheel cast aside by a divine smith, The Jubile Tower, involving a village with a dark secret, Sozrinothâ€™s Temple, an adventure where the heroes must find an artifact and return it to the lair of Sozrinoth the dragon, and more.
